pages.text: $(item)Energion Dust$() can be turned into $(item)Energion Crystal Seeds$() in a $(item)Magnetic Reassembler$(). These seeds can then be planted on the ground and will slowly grow over time, yielding more $(item)Energion Crystal Seeds$().$(br2)Those can then either be replanted or grinded into useable $(item)Energion Dust$().

Those crystals are $(l)HIGHLY DANGEROUS$() once grown, and should $(l)NEVER$() be harvested without the $(item)Crystal Cutter$().$(br2)You can right click a crystal with it to harvest only a stage at a time, or just break it to harvest it all at once.$(br2)Putting Fortune on it increases the yield of grown crystals.
